collectobot module¶

collectobot.add_june_2016()¶

This is a manual method to add june 2016, which only has a monthly json file. Don’t actually use this.

collectobot.pull_data()¶

Pulls all the collect-o-bot data from: http://www.hearthscry.com/CollectOBot and stores them into DATABASE Datebase structure is: [‘id’, ‘date’, ‘json’] with [int, text, text]
